name: Taunton,MAGuide
0:
”Alexa, open Taunton Guide”
”tell me about this place”
”breakfast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: taunton guide
des:
A quick guide to Taunton, a small city in southeastern Massachusetts. No prerequisites required to run this skill. 
With this skill, you will be able to ask Alexa about restaurants and attractions in Taunton, MA. 
Once the skill has been launched, you can say "dinner" and Alexa will direct you to a restaurant and give you information about the restaurant.
This skill is more of a guided conversation, so Alexa will be able to direct you through the guide.
